calculations.name: Limit (Quality)
calculations.tableau_expression:
CASE [Rating Category]
WHEN "AAA" THEN 2000
WHEN  "AA-/AA+" THEN 1000 
WHEN  "BBB-/A+" THEN 1000 
WHEN  "BB/BB+" THEN 500 
END
